responses: Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help?
See you later, thanks for visiting

patterns: How does my order get delivered?
What happens after I order an item?
responses:
When you order in the shop for home delivery, you have to pay attention to:
         As soon as your order is confirmed in the shop, you will get a physical receipt and a copy in your email. Afterwards, the order will get packed in our storage and shipped with GLS

patterns: I wish to cancel my order
I want to cancel my order
How do i cancel my order?
responses: Do you wish to cancel your order, you have to contact customer support: If you sent us an email, you have mark the invoice as Annullering ad DK123456

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
I did not get my item in the package
responses: We try our best to sent the ordered products. If you are unlucky and haven't received the item you have ordered, you need to reach the customer support
